properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:53AM CST until February 20 at 11:15AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...S.F. of the
Forked Deer River...Tallahatchie River...Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* from Wednesday February 19 until Thursday February 20.
* At 09 AM Tuesday the stage was 11.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 15.0 feet on Wednesday February 19.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Wednesday February 19 and
continue to rise to near 15.0 feet by Wednesday February 19.The
river will fall below flood stage by Thursday February 20.
* At 14.0 feet...Flooding of low-lying agricltural land is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
